item.title: Boson Frame Grabber Pt3
item.description: In this part I want to talk about the firmware, or code, this device will need in order to operate as I want.

item.title: Boson Frame Grabber Part 2
item.description: In part 1, I discussed the version 1 prototype I had built. Just after ordering the PCBs for that project I decided to start thinking about miniaturizing the hardware.

item.title: Boson Frame Grabber Part 1
item.description: Designing a thermal camera with the boson
